CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property;Violation of Article 13 - Right to an effective remedy
JUDGES: Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Karel Jungwiert;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Mykhaylo Buromenskiy;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Renate Jaeger
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the town of GPE , GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ordered the ORG company PERSON to pay the applicant CARDINAL NORP hryvnias ( ORG ) in compensation for the non - pecuniary damage caused by the company 's failure to provide him with an apartment .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG initiated enforcement proceedings in respect of the above judgment .
CARDINAL . On DATE the enforcement proceedings were terminated in accordance with the Law of GPE on Measures to ensure GPE and ORG .
CARDINAL . The judgment given in the applicant 's favour remains unenforced .

CARDINAL . The PERSON of DATE on Measures to ensure GPE and ORG ( ORG заходи , спрямовані на забезпечення сталого функціонування підприємств паливно-енергетичного комплексу ” від CARDINAL червня DATE року ) introduced a new mechanism for the payment and amortisation of companies ' debts for energy resources . It also introduced a special register of companies concerned by debt payments and amortisation under its provisions . A company 's inclusion on the register suspends any enforcement proceedings against it . The domestic courts will also dismiss any request to initiate insolvency or liquidation proceedings against the company in question . By the most recent amendment to the PERSON , enacted on DATE , the effect of the debt payment and amortisation programme was extended until DATE .
CARDINAL . The remainder of the relevant law is summarised in the judgment of ORG v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § § CARDINAL , CARDINAL DATE ) .
